node.data: {"nav":{"home":"Home","docs":"Documentation","api":"API","examples":"Examples","github":"GitHub"},"hero":{"title":"Whisper Fetch","subtitle":"Intelligent background file prefetching library for large files during network idle states","getStarted":"Get Started","viewGithub":"GitHub"},"demo":{"title":"Interactive Demo","description":"See how Whisper Fetch works in action","startDemo":"Start Demo","downloading":"Downloading...","done":"Done!","idle":"Idle","completed":"Completed"},"features":{"intelligentDownload":{"title":"Intelligent Background Download","description":"Automatically pauses during foreground network activity and resumes when idle, ensuring no interference with user experience."},"adaptiveChunk":{"title":"Adaptive Chunk Size","description":"Automatically adjusts chunk size from 512KB to 4MB based on network conditions for optimal download performance."},"storage":{"title":"OPFS/IndexedDB Storage","description":"Uses Chrome's OPFS streaming first, with automatic fallback to IndexedDB for broad browser compatibility."},"integrity":{"title":"Integrity Verification","description":"Optional SHA-256 hash verification ensures downloaded file integrity."},"mobileFriendly":{"title":"Mobile Friendly","description":"Designed for mobile with cellular network control, data saver mode respect, and minimum network speed settings."},"reactSupport":{"title":"React Support","description":"Easy-to-use React Hook allows immediate use in React applications."}},"quickStart":{"title":"Quick Start","installation":"Installation","basicUsage":"Basic Usage","reactHook":"React Hook"},"keyFeatures":{"title":"Key Features","autoPauseResume":{"title":"Auto Pause/Resume","description":"Automatically pauses downloads when users actively use the network and resumes when idle. This allows efficient prefetching of large files without disrupting user experience."},"rangeResume":{"title":"Range-based Resume","description":"Uses HTTP Range requests to continue interrupted downloads. No need to restart from the beginning after network errors or user pauses."},"serverRequirements":{"title":"Server Requirements","item1":"HTTP Range support (206 Partial Content)","item2":"ETag/If-Range recommended (for safe resume)"}},"browserSupport":{"title":"Browser Support","description":"Chrome 114+ offers best performance with OPFS streaming. Other modern browsers are supported via IndexedDB fallback."},"cta":{"title":"Get Started Now","description":"Enhance user experience with Whisper Fetch","viewDocs":"View Documentation","viewExamples":"View Examples"},"footer":{"license":"MIT License Â© 2024 jobkaehenry"},"examples":{"title":"Usage Examples","subtitle":"Discover various ways to use Whisper Fetch in real projects","videoStreaming":{"title":"Video Streaming Platform","description":"Pre-download large video files before users watch them to provide a buffer-free viewing experience."},"gameAssets":{"title":"Game Asset Loader","description":"Pre-load next level assets in the background to minimize loading time during level transitions."},"documentViewer":{"title":"Document Viewer","description":"Efficiently preload large PDF or document files for immediate display."},"nextjs":{"title":"Next.js Integration","description":"How to use Whisper Fetch in Next.js App Router. Mark as client component to prevent SSR issues."},"offline":{"title":"Offline Content Manager","description":"Pre-download and cache content for users to view offline later."},"progressive":{"title":"Progressive Image Loading","description":"Display low-quality thumbnails first, load high-quality images in the background for smooth transitions."},"moreUseCases":{"title":"More Use Cases","musicStreaming":{"title":"Music Streaming","description":"Pre-download next songs in playlist for seamless playback experience."},"ebook":{"title":"E-book Reader","description":"Pre-load next chapters based on user's current reading position."},"designTool":{"title":"Design Tool","description":"Load high-resolution assets and font files in the background for immediate use."},"dataViz":{"title":"Data Visualization","description":"Pre-download large datasets for fast chart rendering."},"videoEditor":{"title":"Video Editor","description":"Pre-load next clips in timeline for smooth editing experience."},"maps":{"title":"Map Application","description":"Pre-download surrounding tiles and layers for fast map navigation."}},"ctaTitle":"Apply to Your Project","ctaDescription":"Whisper Fetch can be flexibly configured for various use cases"},"language":"Language"}
